verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%> upon Sheminith <S%H8067><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. Help <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, YY <S%H3068><s%>; for the godly man <S%H2623><s%> ceaseht <S%H1584><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; for the faithful <S%H539><s%> <S%H8803><s%> fail <S%H6461><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from among the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.

They speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> with his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>: with flattering <S%H2513><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> and with a double <S%H3820><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> do they speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> shall cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all flattering <S%H2513><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>, and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> that speaketh <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8764><s%> proud <S%H1419><s%> things:
Who have said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, With our tongue <S%H3956><s%> will we prevail <S%H1396><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; our lips <S%H8193><s%> are our own: who is lord <S%H113><s%> over us?

For the oppression <S%H7701><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%>, for the sighing <S%H603><s%> of the needy <S%H34><s%>, now will I arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; I will set <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him in safety <S%H3468><s%> from him that puffeth <S%H6315><s%> <S%H8686><s%> at him.

The words <S%H565><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> are pure <S%H2889><s%> words <S%H565><s%>: as silver <S%H3701><s%> tried <S%H6884><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in a furnace <S%H5948><s%> of earth <S%H776><s%>, purified <S%H2212><s%> <S%H8794><s%> seven times <S%H7659><s%>.
Thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, thou shalt preserve <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them from this <S%H2098><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8691><s%> on every side <S%H5439><s%>, when the vilest <S%H2149><s%> men <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> are exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
